PLT_MediaItem Class Reference

The PLT_MediaItem class represents a first-level class derived directly from PLT_MediaObject. More...

#include <PltMediaItem.h>

Inheritance diagram for PLT_MediaItem:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The PLT_MediaItem class represents a first-level class derived directly from PLT_MediaObject.

It most often represents a single piece of AV data.
